content.title: Educational Award Scheme - Gujarat Labour Welfare Board
content.department: Labour, Skill Development & Employment Department, Government of Gujarat
content.details: The “Educational Award Scheme” is implemented by the Gujarat Labour Welfare Board, Labour, Skill Development & Employment Department, Government of Gujarat. The scheme has been implemented to encourage the students of the Labours to increase their enthusiasm and to get higher education through it.
benefits: Under the scheme, children of laborers who have passed 70% or above marks in the 10th Standard will receive ₹2,500/- as an award.
The children of laborers who have passed 70% or above marks in the 12th Standard will receive ₹5,000/- as an award.
eligibility: Only the children (students) whose parents are working in a factory/institute in the state of Gujarat and whose parents have been paying the Labour Welfare Fund will be eligible for this scheme.
The children of labourers who have passed 70% and above marks in the 10th or 12th Standard can avail the benefits under the scheme.
content.application_process: Online. Applicants may visit the Sanman Portal: https://sanman.gujarat.gov.in/ and follow the registration and application steps provided.
documents_required: Identity proof of Child i.e. Aadhaar Card

faqs.question: What is the Educational Award Scheme?
faqs.answer: The Educational Award Scheme is an initiative by the Gujarat Labour Welfare Board, Labour, Skill Development & Employment Department, Government of Gujarat, aimed at encouraging the children of laborers to pursue higher education.

faqs.question: Who is eligible to benefit from this scheme?
faqs.answer: Children (students) whose parents work in a factory/institute in the state of Gujarat and have been contributing to the Labour Welfare Fund are eligible for this scheme.

faqs.question: What are the benefits offered under the scheme?
faqs.answer: Under this scheme, students who have secured 70% or above marks in the 10th Standard will receive ₹2,500/- as an award, and those who have achieved the same in the 12th Standard will receive ₹5,000/- as an award.

faqs.question: How can eligible applicants apply for the scheme?
faqs.answer: Eligible applicants can apply for the scheme by visiting the Sanman Portal at https://sanman.gujarat.gov.in/.

faqs.question: Can children of laborers from other states apply for this scheme if they are studying in Gujarat?
faqs.answer: No, this scheme is specifically for the children of laborers working in factories/institutes within the state of Gujarat.

faqs.question: Are there any specific documents required for the application process?
faqs.answer: Yes, applicants may be required to provide documents proving their employment in a factory/institute in Gujarat and proof of contribution to the Labour Welfare Fund.
